quote: I’d always be watching her. And she knew now that she belonged to me. Every breath she took, every step she made, every smile she faked, I’d always be there, watching her, waiting for her.
quote_letters: ID ALWAYS BE WATCHING HER AND SHE KNEW NOW THAT SHE BELONGED TO ME EVERY BREATH SHE TOOK EVERY STEP SHE MADE EVERY SMILE SHE FAKED ID ALWAYS BE THERE WATCHING HER WAITING FOR HER
